channel.title: Exceptions = kicks?
channel.description:
in every exception my server gets i noticed that it has a few of the same exceptions every time one in client.java located on line 12816
[code] } catch(java.lang.Exception __ex) { __ex.printStackTrace(); disconnected = true; System.out.println("Shamon Scape Server [fatal] - exception"); } return true; }[/code]
and one in server.java located on line 59 [code]playerHandler.process();[/code]
is this normal? is this bad? and can it be fixed?
here are a few of the exceptions ive seen i fixed about to of them the main one is the third [code] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -44 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:13234) at client.packetProcess(client.java:12817) at client.process(client.java:12788) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:59) Shamon Scape Server [fatal] - exception
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:8385) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15164) at client.packetProcess(client.java:12816) at client.process(client.java:12787) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:59)
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap spac at client.<init>(client.java:7459) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:159) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.sendQuest(client.java:7070) at client.setSkillLevel(client.java:8177) at client.process(client.java:12595) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:59) Client type: high memory version[/code]

item.title: Exceptions = kicks?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

in every exception my server gets i noticed that it has a few of the same exceptions every time
one in client.java located on line 12816

} catch(java.lang.Exception __ex) { __ex.printStackTrace(); disconnected = true; System.out.println("Shamon Scape Server [fatal] - exception"); } return true; }

and one in server.java located on line 59

playerHandler.process();

is this normal?
is this bad?
and can it be fixed?

here are a few of the exceptions ive seen
i fixed about to of them
the main one is the third

[code]
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -44
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:13234)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:12817)
at client.process(client.java:12788)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
at server.main(server.java:59)
Shamon Scape Server [fatal] - exception

java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1
at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source)
at client.customCommand(client.java:8385)
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15164)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:12816)
at client.process(client.java:12787)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
at server.main(server.java:59)

Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap spac
at client.(client.java:7459)
at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44)
at server.run(server.java:159)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.sendQuest(client.java:7070)
at client.setSkillLevel(client.java:8177)
at client.process(client.java:12595)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
at server.main(server.java:59)
Client type: high memory version[/code]
